mdRecord.dcterms:title: Receipted Bill, Dr. James Craik to His Excy George Washington, 1797-1799
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Dr. Craik's bill from Aug. 25, 1797 - June 14, 1799 for £ 97.11.9, for visits to and treatment of members of George Washington's family and servants on all the farms -- includes visits to attend Mr. Peter's child and "a visit to and attendce on yourself from 21st to 26th and prescription" £4.0.0 -- a dozen oranges -- "Bleeding yourself ..." Autograph document signed, docketed by George Washington "Receipt Doct. Jas. Craik, Bal. $128.88 27 June 1799," watermark (crown over encircled heraldic device). Receipted by Jas. Craik on June 27, 1799.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medicine--History--18th century
Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
